17 ObservationAgent::ObservationAgent() {
18  ros::NodeHandle nh("~");
19  initialize();
20 }

22 ObservationAgent::~ObservationAgent() {

25 void ObservationAgent::initialize(){
26  ros::NodeHandle nh("~");
27 
28  /*
29  * Initializing ros services
30  */
31  ObsUpdater = nh.serviceClient<hrc_ros::InformObsToTaskMang>("/hrc_task_manager/observation_update"); // Client for the task manager service for the status update
32 
34  is_ov = nh.serviceClient<std_srvs::Trigger>("/human/is_ov"); // ACTION: LOOK AROUND
35  is_oir = nh.serviceClient<std_srvs::Trigger>("/human/is_oir"); // SITUATION: IS HUMAN DETECTED?
36  //ros::ServiceClient is_ho = nh.serviceClient<std_srvs::Trigger>("/human/is_ho");
37  is_a0 = nh.serviceClient<std_srvs::Trigger>("/human/is_a0"); // ACTION: GRASP ATTEMPT
38  is_a2 = nh.serviceClient<std_srvs::Trigger>("/human/is_a2"); // ACTION: IDLE
39  is_a4 = nh.serviceClient<std_srvs::Trigger>("/human/is_a4"); // ACTION: WARN THE ROBOT
40 
41  /*
42  * ROS Services initialization
43  */
44  action_server = nh.advertiseService("/observation_agent/inform_human_action", &ObservationAgent::action_to_obs_Map, this);
45  new_state__server = nh.advertiseService("/observation_agent/inform_new_human_state", &ObservationAgent::humanSt_to_robotSt_Map, this);
46  reset_scenario = nh.advertiseService("/observation_agent/reset", &ObservationAgent::resetScenario, this);
47 
48  /*
49  * A ROS topic for a subscription to tray proximity sensors (detecting packages in the trays)
50  */
51  traySensor_subs = nh.subscribe("/production_line/tray_sensors", 1000, &ObservationAgent::ReceiveTraySensors, this);
52 
54  task_timer = nh.createTimer(ros::Duration(1.0), &ObservationAgent::HumanTaskTimer, this);
55 
56 
58  ros::Rate rate(0.2);
59 
60  ROS_INFO("Observation Agent is created !");
61  ros::spin();
62 }
63 
64 bool ObservationAgent::resetScenario(hrc_ros::ResetObsROSRequest &req,
65  hrc_ros::ResetObsROSResponse &res) {
66  if (req.assignedTo == "human"){
67  prev_robot_state = "TaskHuman";
68  prev_human_state = "TaskHuman";
69  real_robot_state_name = "TaskHuman";
70  whoIsAssigned = "human";
71  }else if (req.assignedTo == "robot"){
72  prev_robot_state = "TaskRobot";
73  prev_human_state = "TaskRobot";
74  real_robot_state_name = "TaskRobot";
75  whoIsAssigned = "robot";
76  }
77 
78 
79  humanTrustsRobot = (req.humanTrustsRobot == "YES") ? true : false;
80  humanType = req.humanType;
81  humanMood = req.humanMood;
82  robotType = req.robotType;
83 
84  prev_real_robot_state = real_robot_state_name;
85  prev_robot_observation_pomdp = "";
86  prev_observables = "0";
87 
88  human_task_time = 0; // counting the time spent when a task is assigned to the human
89  humanAttempted = false;
90 
91  FailedStCounter = 0;
92  EvaluateStCounter = 0;
93  TiredStCounter = 0;
94  NoAttentionCounter = 0;
95 
96  humanidle_counter = 0;
97  humanfail_counter = 0;
98 
99  ipd_sensor = false; // inspected product detector sensor
100  upd_sensor = false; // uninspected product detector sensor
101  ROS_INFO("OBSERVATION ROS: Reset!");
102  res.success = true;
103  return true;
104 }
105 
106 void ObservationAgent::HumanTaskTimer(const ros::TimerEvent&){
107  human_task_time += 1; // increase one in every second
108 }
109 
110 // ********* WEB CLIENTS TO COMMUNICATE WITH DESPOT *********** //
111 // HUMAN ACTION IS RECEIVED !!!
112 bool ObservationAgent::action_to_obs_Map(hrc_ros::InformHumanAction::Request &req,
113  hrc_ros::InformHumanAction::Response &res) {
114 
115  //WebSocket (WS)-client at port 7070 using 1 thread
116  WsClient client("localhost:7070");
117 
118  client.on_open=[&]() {
119 
120  std_srvs::Trigger::Request req1;
121  std_srvs::Trigger::Response resp1;
122  is_ov.call(req1, resp1);
123  bool ov = resp1.success; // object is visiable
124 
125  std_srvs::Trigger::Request req2;
126  std_srvs::Trigger::Response resp2;
127  is_oir.call(req2, resp2);
128  bool oir = resp2.success; // object is in range
129 
130  bool ipd = ipd_sensor; // inspected product is detected // SITUATION: INSPECTED PRODUCT DETECTED? (SUCCESS)
131  bool upd = upd_sensor; // uninspected product is detected // SITUATION: UNINSPECTED PRODUT DETECTED? (FAIL)
132  /*
133  std_srvs::Trigger::Request req3;
134  std_srvs::Trigger::Response resp3;
135  is_ho.call(req3, resp3);
136  bool ho = resp3.success; // have object
137  */
138  std_srvs::Trigger::Request req5;
139  std_srvs::Trigger::Response resp5;
140  is_a0.call(req5, resp5);
141  bool a0 = resp5.success; // action is attemp grasp
142 
143  std_srvs::Trigger::Request req6;
144  std_srvs::Trigger::Response resp6;
145  is_a2.call(req6, resp6);
146  bool a2 = resp6.success; // action is staying idle
147 
148  std_srvs::Trigger::Request req7;
149  std_srvs::Trigger::Response resp7;
150  is_a4.call(req7, resp7);
151  bool a4 = resp7.success; // action is warn robot
152 
153  // ===== ADDING A NOISE TO THE OBSERVATIONS ========
154  bool ov_noisy = ov;
155  bool oir_noisy = oir;
156  bool a0_noisy = a0;
157  bool ipd_noisy = ipd;
158  bool a4_noisy = a4;
159  bool a2_noisy = a2;
160  bool upd_noisy = upd;
161 
162  int r = rand() % 10;
163  int m = rand() % 2; // mixed or missed
164  if ((a0 || a4) && r == 0){ // if one of this is one then 10% noise
165  if (m == 0){ // 5 % chance of mixing up a0 and a4
166  a0_noisy = not a0;
167  a4_noisy = not a4;
168  } else if (m == 1){ // 5 % chance of missing the gesture and assuming idle (a2)
169  a0_noisy = false;
170  a4_noisy = false;
171  a2_noisy = true;
172  }
173  } else if (((not ov) || a2) && r == 0){ // if either looking around (not ov) or idle is detected, 10 % chance of mixing them up
174  ov_noisy = not ov;
175  a2_noisy = not a2;
176  }
177  // ===================================================
178 
179  string robot_observation_real = "", observation = "", robot_observation_noisy = "";
180  robot_observation_real = MapObservablesToObservations(ov,oir,a0,ipd,a4,a2,upd);
181  robot_observation_noisy = MapObservablesToObservations(ov_noisy,oir_noisy,a0_noisy,ipd_noisy,a4_noisy,a2_noisy,upd_noisy);
182 
183  if (robotType == "reactive"){
184  observation = MapObservationsToMDP(robot_observation_noisy); // Get correspending state for reactive ROBOT wrt observations to state mapping
185  } else if (robotType == "proactive"){
186  observation = MapObservationsToPOMDP(robot_observation_noisy); // Get correspending observation for proactive ROBOT wrt observables received
187  }
188 
189  ROS_INFO("OBSERVATION ROS: real_observable: %s, noisy_observable: %s, mapped observation: %s",
190  robot_observation_real.c_str(), robot_observation_noisy.c_str(), observation.c_str());
191  string message = observation + ",-1"; // It is only sending observed_state, real state is send in another iteration (when it is provided)
192 
193  // ############ SENDING OBSERVATIONS TO TASK MANAGER ############
194 
195  hrc_ros::ObsUpdateMsg obs_update;
196 
197  hrc_ros::InformObsToTaskMang::Request reqForUpdate;
198  hrc_ros::InformObsToTaskMang::Response resForUpdate;
199 
200  obs_update.stamp_obs_update = ros::Time::now();
201 
202  std::vector<uint8_t> real_obs_received;
203  real_obs_received.push_back(not ov);
204  real_obs_received.push_back(oir);
205  real_obs_received.push_back(a0);
206  real_obs_received.push_back(ipd);
207  real_obs_received.push_back(a4);
208  real_obs_received.push_back(a2);
209  real_obs_received.push_back(upd);
210 
211  obs_update.real_obs_received = real_obs_received;
212 
213 
214  std::vector<uint8_t> obs_with_noise;
215  obs_with_noise.push_back(not ov_noisy);
216  obs_with_noise.push_back(oir_noisy);
217  obs_with_noise.push_back(a0_noisy);
218  obs_with_noise.push_back(ipd_noisy);
219  obs_with_noise.push_back(a4_noisy);
220  obs_with_noise.push_back(a2_noisy);
221  obs_with_noise.push_back(upd_noisy);
222 
223  obs_update.obs_with_noise = obs_with_noise;
224  obs_update.who_succeeded = whoSucceeded;
225 
226  reqForUpdate.obs_update = obs_update;
227  ObsUpdater.call(reqForUpdate, resForUpdate);
228 
229  // ###########################################################################################
230 
231  ROS_INFO("OBSERVATION Client: Sending to the robot planner:: OBSERVATION= %s", message.c_str());
232  auto send_stream=make_shared<WsClient::SendStream>();
233  *send_stream << message;
234  client.send(send_stream);
235  };
236 
237  client.on_message=[&client](shared_ptr<WsClient::Message> message) {
238  client.send_close(1000);
239  };
240 
241  client.start();
242 
243  return true;
244 }
245 
246 bool ObservationAgent::humanSt_to_robotSt_Map(hrc_ros::InformHumanState::Request &req,
247  hrc_ros::InformHumanState::Response &res) {
248 
249  //WebSocket (WS)-client at port 7070 using 1 thread
250  WsClient client("localhost:7070");
251 
252  client.on_open=[&]() {
253  string realRbtSt_code = "";
254  if (robotType == "reactive"){
255  realRbtSt_code = getRealRbtStMDP(req.new_human_state); // this is the mapped human state to the robot's. Robot should estimate it correctly
256  } else if (robotType == "proactive"){
257  realRbtSt_code = getRealRbtStPOMDP(req.new_human_state); //For POMDP model
258  }
259 
260  string message = "-1," + realRbtSt_code;
261 
262  ROS_INFO("OBSERVATION Client: Sending to the robot planner:: REAL STATE WAS = %s", message.c_str());
263  auto send_stream=make_shared<WsClient::SendStream>();
264  *send_stream << message;
265  client.send(send_stream);
266  };
267 
268  client.on_message=[&client](shared_ptr<WsClient::Message> message) {
269  //cout << "Client: Sending close connection" << endl;
270  client.send_close(1000);
271  };
272 
273  client.start();
274 
275  return true;
276 }
277 // ********************************** //
278 
279 // ********* CALLBACKS *********** //
280 void ObservationAgent::ReceiveTraySensors(const hrc_ros::TraySensor &msg){
281  tray_msg_stamp = msg.stamp;
282 
283  if (msg.tray_id == "tray_unprocessed"){
284  if (msg.occupied)
285  upd_sensor = true;
286  else
287  upd_sensor = false;
288  }
289  if (msg.tray_id == "tray_human"){
290  if (msg.occupied){
291  ipd_sensor = true;
292  whoSucceeded = "human";
293  }else{
294  ipd_sensor = false;
295  whoSucceeded = "";
296  }
297  }
298  if (msg.tray_id == "tray_robot"){
299  if (msg.occupied){
300  ipd_sensor = true;
301  whoSucceeded = "robot";
302  }else{
303  ipd_sensor = false;
304  whoSucceeded = "";
305  }
306  }
307 }
308 // ********************************** //
309 
310 // ********* MAIN OPERATIONS: MAPPING OF HUMAN OBSERVATIONS AND STATES TO ROBOT OBSERVATIONS AND STATES FOR DESPOT *********** //
311 void ObservationAgent::humanStCounter(string humanState){
312 
313  if (humanState == "FailedToGrasp")
314  FailedStCounter++;
315  if (humanState == "Evaluating")
316  EvaluateStCounter++;
317  if (humanState == "Tired")
318  TiredStCounter++;
319  if (humanState == "NoAttention")
320  NoAttentionCounter++;
321  if (humanState == "TaskHuman" || humanState == "TaskRobot"){
322  FailedStCounter = 0;
323  EvaluateStCounter = 0;
324  TiredStCounter = 0;
325  NoAttentionCounter = 0;
326  }
327 }
328 
329 string ObservationAgent::getRealRbtStPOMDP(string humanState)
330 {
331  /*
332  * TaskHuman
333  * MayNotBeCapable
334  * MayBeTired
335  * NoFocus
336  * NeedsToBeReminded
337  * NeedsHelp
338  * NoNeedHelp
339  * WarningReceived
340  * GlobalSuccess
341  * GlobalFail
342  * TaskRobot
343  */
344 
345  string currRbtSt = "0";
346  humanStCounter(humanState);
347 
348  if (humanState == "TaskHuman"){
349  real_robot_state_name = "TaskHuman";
350  } else if (humanState == "GlobalSuccess"){
351  real_robot_state_name = "GlobalSuccess";
352  } else if (humanState == "GlobalFail"){
353  real_robot_state_name = "GlobalFail";
354  } else if (humanState == "Evaluating"){
355  if (humanMood == "tired"){
356  real_robot_state_name = "MayBeTired";
357  } else if (EvaluateStCounter <= 2){
358  // any prev estimation (either taskhuman, nofocus, may not be capable, may be tired)
359  real_robot_state_name = (whoIsAssigned == "human") ? "TaskHuman": "TaskRobot"; // seriously evaluating :)
360  } else if (EvaluateStCounter > 2){
361  if (FailedStCounter > 0){
362  if (prev_real_robot_state != "MayNotBeCapable" || prev_real_robot_state != "NeedsHelp"){
363  real_robot_state_name = "MayNotBeCapable";
364  } else if (humanTrustsRobot){
365  real_robot_state_name = "NeedsHelp";
366  } else {
367  real_robot_state_name = "MayBeTired";
368  }
369  }
370  if (NoAttentionCounter > 0){
371  if (prev_real_robot_state != "NoFocus" || prev_real_robot_state != "NeedsToBeReminded"){
372  real_robot_state_name = "NoFocus";
373  } else if (prev_real_robot_state == "NoFocus"){
374  real_robot_state_name = "NeedsToBeReminded";
375  } else if (humanTrustsRobot && FailedStCounter > 0){
376  real_robot_state_name = "NeedsHelp";
377  } else {
378  real_robot_state_name = "MayBeTired";
379  }
380  }
381  if (FailedStCounter == 0 && NoAttentionCounter == 0){
382  real_robot_state_name = (whoIsAssigned == "human") ? "TaskHuman": "TaskRobot";
383  }
384  }
385  } else if (humanState == "FailedToGrasp"){
386  if (FailedStCounter == 1){
387  if (humanTrustsRobot && EvaluateStCounter > 1){ // already one spent before failing. thinking more than twice and already failed once
388  real_robot_state_name = "NeedsHelp";
389  } else { // evaluated less than 2 iteration, might still be not capable
390  real_robot_state_name = "MayNotBeCapable";
391  }
392  } else if (FailedStCounter >= 2){
393  if (humanTrustsRobot && (prev_human_state != "FailedToGrasp")){ // means not constantly trying and trusting the human
394  real_robot_state_name = "NeedsHelp";
395  } else {
396  real_robot_state_name = "NoNeedHelp"; //TODO: may think of more about this
397  }
398  }
399  } else if (humanState == "NoAttention"){
400  if (humanMood == "tired"){
401  real_robot_state_name = "MayBeTired";
402  } else if (NoAttentionCounter == 1){
403  real_robot_state_name = "NoFocus";
404  } else if (NoAttentionCounter == 1 && EvaluateStCounter > 1){
405  real_robot_state_name = "NeedsToBeReminded";
406  } else if (NoAttentionCounter >= 2){
407  real_robot_state_name = "NeedsToBeReminded";
408  }
409  } else if (humanState == "Tired"){
410  if (TiredStCounter == 1){
411  real_robot_state_name = "MayBeTired";
412  if (humanTrustsRobot && (NoAttentionCounter > 1 || EvaluateStCounter > 2))
413  real_robot_state_name = "NeedsHelp";
414  } else { // tired state multiple times
415  if (humanTrustsRobot){
416  real_robot_state_name = "NeedsHelp";
417  } else {
418  real_robot_state_name = "NoNeedHelp";
419  }
420  }
421  } else if (humanState == "Recovery"){
422  real_robot_state_name = "NeedsHelp";
423  } else if (humanState == "WarningTheRobot"){
424  real_robot_state_name = "WarningReceived";
425  } else if (humanState == "RobotIsWarned"){
426  real_robot_state_name = "NoNeedHelp";
427  } else if (humanState == "TaskRobot"){
428  real_robot_state_name = "TaskRobot";
429  }
430  prev_real_robot_state = real_robot_state_name;
431 
432  //Returning with the state number for the despot planner !!
433  if (real_robot_state_name == "TaskHuman")
434  currRbtSt = "0";
435  else if (real_robot_state_name == "MayNotBeCapable")
436  currRbtSt = "1";
437  else if (real_robot_state_name == "MayBeTired")
438  currRbtSt = "2";
439  else if (real_robot_state_name == "NoFocus")
440  currRbtSt = "3";
441  else if (real_robot_state_name == "NeedsToBeReminded")
442  currRbtSt = "4";
443  else if (real_robot_state_name == "NeedsHelp")
444  currRbtSt = "5";
445  else if (real_robot_state_name == "NoNeedHelp")
446  currRbtSt = "6";
447  else if (real_robot_state_name == "WarningReceived")
448  currRbtSt = "7";
449  else if (real_robot_state_name == "GlobalSuccess")
450  currRbtSt = "8";
451  else if (real_robot_state_name == "GlobalFail")
452  currRbtSt = "9";
453  else if (real_robot_state_name == "TaskRobot")
454  currRbtSt = "10";
455 
456  return currRbtSt;
457 }
458 
459 string ObservationAgent::MapObservationsToPOMDP(string observable){
460 
461 
462  string robot_observation = "";
463 
464  if (observable == "0" || observable == "1") {
465  robot_observation = "0";
466  }
467  else if (observable == "2") {
468  robot_observation = "1";
469  }
470  else if (observable == "3") {
471  robot_observation = "2";
472  }
473  else if (observable == "6") {
474  robot_observation = "3";
475  }
476  else if (observable == "7") {
477  robot_observation = "4";
478  }
479  else if (observable == "8" || observable == "9" || observable == "10" || observable == "11" || observable == "14" || observable == "15") {
480  robot_observation = "5";
481  }
482  else if (observable == "16" || observable == "17" || observable == "18" || observable == "19" || observable == "27") {
483  robot_observation = "6";
484  }
485  else if (observable == "32" || observable == "33") {
486  robot_observation = "7";
487  }
488  else if (observable == "34") {
489  robot_observation = "8";
490  }
491  else if (observable == "35") {
492  robot_observation = "9";
493  }
494  else if (observable == "40" || observable == "42" || observable == "43") {
495  robot_observation = "10";
496  }
497  else if (observable == "64" || observable == "65" || observable == "66" || observable == "67" || observable == "70" || observable == "71") {
498  robot_observation = "11";
499  }
500  else if (observable == "80" || observable == "81" || observable == "82" || observable == "83" || observable == "84" || observable == "85") {
501  robot_observation = "11";
502  }
503  else if (observable == "86" || observable == "87" || observable == "96" || observable == "98" ||observable == "99" ||observable == "103") {
504  robot_observation = "11";
505  }else{
506  robot_observation = prev_robot_observation_pomdp;
507  }
508 
509  prev_robot_observation_pomdp = robot_observation;
510  return robot_observation;
511 }
512 
513 //TODO: the observable names of ov and oir update. !OV = Looking Around and OIR = Human is detected
514 //TODO: Simplify the observation combinations if the reactive model responds almost better than the proactive one!
515 string ObservationAgent::MapObservablesToObservations(bool ov, bool oir, bool a0, bool ipd, bool a4, bool a2, bool upd){
516  string robot_observation = prev_observables;
517  if (not ov && not oir && not a0 && not ipd && not a4 && not a2 && not upd) {
518  robot_observation = "0";
519  }
520  else if (ov && not oir && not a0 && not ipd && not a4 && not a2 && not upd) {
521  robot_observation = "1";
522  }
523  else if (not ov && oir && not a0 && not ipd && not a4 && not a2 && not upd) {
524  robot_observation = "2";
525  }
526  else if (ov && oir && not a0 && not ipd && not a4 && not a2 && not upd) {
527  robot_observation = "3";
528  }
529  else if (not ov && oir && a0 && not ipd && not a4 && not a2 && not upd) {
530  robot_observation = "6";
531  }
532  else if (ov && oir && a0 && not ipd && not a4 && not a2 && not upd) {
533  robot_observation = "7";
534  }
535  else if (not ov && not oir && not a0 && ipd && not a4 && not a2 && not upd) {
536  robot_observation = "8";
537  }
538  else if (ov && not oir && not a0 && ipd && not a4 && not a2 && not upd) {
539  robot_observation = "9";
540  }
541  else if (not ov && oir && not a0 && ipd && not a4 && not a2 && not upd) {
542  robot_observation = "10";
543  }
544  else if (ov && oir && not a0 && ipd && not a4 && not a2 && not upd) {
545  robot_observation = "11";
546  }
547  else if (not ov && oir && a0 && ipd && not a4 && not a2 && not upd) {
548  robot_observation = "14";
549  }
550  else if (ov && oir && a0 && ipd && not a4 && not a2 && not upd) {
551  robot_observation = "15";
552  }
553  else if (not ov && not oir && not a0 && not ipd && a4 && not a2 && not upd) {
554  robot_observation = "16";
555  }
556  else if (not ov && oir && not a0 && not ipd && a4 && not a2 && not upd) {
557  robot_observation = "18";
558  }
559  else if (ov && oir && not a0 && not ipd && a4 && not a2 && not upd) {
560  robot_observation = "19";
561  }
562  else if (ov && oir && not a0 && ipd && a4 && not a2 && not upd) {
563  robot_observation = "27";
564  }
565  else if (not ov && not oir && not a0 && not ipd && not a4 && a2 && not upd) {
566  robot_observation = "32";
567  }
568  else if (not ov && oir && not a0 && not ipd && not a4 && a2 && not upd) {
569  robot_observation = "34";
570  }
571  else if (ov && oir && not a0 && not ipd && not a4 && a2 && not upd) {
572  robot_observation = "35";
573  }
574  else if (not ov && not oir && not a0 && ipd && not a4 && a2 && not upd) {
575  robot_observation = "40";
576  }
577  else if (not ov && oir && not a0 && ipd && not a4 && a2 && not upd) {
578  robot_observation = "42";
579  }
580  else if (ov && oir && not a0 && ipd && not a4 && a2 && not upd) {
581  robot_observation = "43";
582  }
583  else if (not ov && oir && a0 && ipd && not a4 && a2 && not upd) {
584  robot_observation = "46";
585  }
586  else if (ov && oir && a0 && ipd && not a4 && a2 && not upd) {
587  robot_observation = "47";
588  }
589  else if (not ov && not oir && not a0 && not ipd && not a4 && not a2 && upd) {
590  robot_observation = "64";
591  }
592  else if (not ov && oir && not a0 && not ipd && not a4 && not a2 && upd) {
593  robot_observation = "66";
594  }
595  else if (ov && oir && not a0 && not ipd && not a4 && not a2 && upd) {
596  robot_observation = "67";
597  }
598  else if (not ov && oir && a0 && not ipd && not a4 && not a2 && upd) {
599  robot_observation = "70";
600  }
601  else if (ov && oir && a0 && not ipd && not a4 && not a2 && upd) {
602  robot_observation = "71";
603  }
604  else if (not ov && not oir && not a0 && not ipd && a4 && not a2 && upd) {
605  robot_observation = "80";
606  }
607  else if (not ov && oir && not a0 && not ipd && a4 && not a2 && upd) {
608  robot_observation = "82";
609  }
610  else if (ov && oir && not a0 && not ipd && a4 && not a2 && upd) {
611  robot_observation = "83";
612  }
613  else if (not ov && oir && a0 && not ipd && a4 && not a2 && upd) {
614  robot_observation = "86";
615  }
616  else if (ov && oir && a0 && not ipd && a4 && not a2 && upd) {
617  robot_observation = "87";
618  }
619  else if (not ov && not oir && not a0 && not ipd && not a4 && a2 && upd) {
620  robot_observation = "96";
621  }
622  else if (not ov && oir && not a0 && not ipd && not a4 && a2 && upd) {
623  robot_observation = "98";
624  }
625  else if (ov && oir && not a0 && not ipd && not a4 && a2 && upd) {
626  robot_observation = "99";
627  }
628  else if (not ov && oir && a0 && not ipd && not a4 && a2 && upd) {
629  robot_observation = "102";
630  }
631  else if (ov && oir && a0 && not ipd && not a4 && a2 && upd) {
632  robot_observation = "103";
633  }
634  else if (upd == 1){
635  robot_observation = "64";
636  }
637  else if (ipd == 1){
638  robot_observation = "8";
639  }
640  prev_observables = robot_observation;
641 
642  return robot_observation;
643 }
644 
645 string ObservationAgent::getRealRbtStMDP(string humanState)
646 {
647  // The real full names of the states
648  string currRbtSt = "0";
649 
650  humanStCounter(humanState);
651  // In REACTIVE MODEL ROBOT IS NOT ABLE TO REASON ABOUT EVALUATING AND NO ATTENTION STATES
652  if (humanState == "TaskHuman" || humanState == "Evaluating" || humanState == "NoAttention"){
653  currRbtSt = "0";
654  real_robot_state_name = "TaskHuman";
655  } else if (humanState == "GlobalSuccess"){
656  currRbtSt = "1";
657  real_robot_state_name = "GlobalSuccess";
658  } else if (humanState == "GlobalFail"){
659  currRbtSt = "5";
660  real_robot_state_name = "GlobalFail";
661  } else if (humanState == "FailedToGrasp" && FailedStCounter >= 1){ // after a fail it already indicates the human needs help
662  if(humanTrustsRobot){ // human should trust the robot.
663  currRbtSt = "2";
664  real_robot_state_name = "HumanNeedsHelp";
665  } else {
666  currRbtSt = "0";
667  real_robot_state_name = "TaskHuman";
668  }
669  } else if (humanState == "Tired" && TiredStCounter >= 1){ // after one iteration in tired state it already indicates the human needs help
670  if(humanTrustsRobot){ // human should trust the robot.
671  currRbtSt = "2";
672  real_robot_state_name = "HumanNeedsHelp";
673  } else{
674  currRbtSt = "0";
675  real_robot_state_name = "TaskHuman";
676  }
677  } else if (humanState == "Recovery"){
678  currRbtSt = "2";
679  real_robot_state_name = "HumanNeedsHelp";
680  } else if (humanState == "WarningTheRobot"){
681  currRbtSt = "3";
682  real_robot_state_name = "WarningReceived";
683  } else if (humanState == "RobotIsWarned"){
684  currRbtSt = "3";
685  real_robot_state_name = "TaskHuman";
686  }
687  else if (humanState == "TaskRobot"){
688  currRbtSt = "4";
689  real_robot_state_name = "TaskRobot";
690  }
691  return currRbtSt;
692 }
693 
694 string ObservationAgent::MapObservationsToMDP(string observation) {
695  /*
696  * Here are the Reactive robot states:
697  * TaskHuman
698  GlobalSuccess
699  HumanNeedsHelp
700  WarningReceived
701  TaskRobot
702  GlobalFail
703  */
704  string robot_state = "";
705  if ((prev_robot_state != "HumanNeedsHelp") && human_task_time >= 15 && (not ipd_sensor && not upd_sensor)){ // if human attempted to grasp in previous action yet still no success
706  ROS_INFO("OBSERVATION ROS: Timeout! Task will be taken over by the ROBOT!");
707  robot_state = "HumanNeedsHelp";
708  } else if ((prev_robot_state != "HumanNeedsHelp") && humanAttempted && (not ipd_sensor && not upd_sensor)) {
709  humanAttempted = false;
710  robot_state = "HumanNeedsHelp";
711  humanfail_counter = 0; // TODO: this is not being used anywhere but still here
712  } else {
713 
714  if (observation == "0") {
715  if (prev_robot_state == "TaskHuman")
716  robot_state = "HumanNeedsHelp"; // whoever is assigned for the first state
717  else if (prev_robot_state == "TaskRobot")
718  robot_state = "TaskRobot"; // whoever is assigned for the first state
719  } else if ((observation == "2" || observation == "3")) {
720  robot_state = prev_robot_state; // This is either task assigned to human or task assigned to the robot
721  } else if (observation == "6" || observation == "7") { // human attempted to grasp
722  humanAttempted = true;
723  robot_state = "TaskHuman";
724  humanfail_counter ++; // TODO: i am increasing this but for now has nothing to do about the state decisions
725  } else if (observation == "8" || observation == "9" || observation == "10" || observation == "11") {
726  robot_state = "GlobalSuccess";
727  } else if (observation == "12" || observation == "13" || observation == "14" || observation == "15") {
728  robot_state = "GlobalSuccess";
729  } else if (observation == "40" || observation == "41" || observation == "42" || observation == "43") {
730  robot_state = "GlobalSuccess";
731  } else if (observation == "44" || observation == "45" || observation == "46" || observation == "47") {
732  robot_state = "GlobalSuccess";
733  } else if (observation == "34" || observation == "35") {
734  robot_state = prev_robot_state; // whoever is assigned for the first state
735  humanidle_counter ++; // idle counter is not used anywhere currently
736  } else if (observation == "32" || observation == "33") { // human is not detected
737  robot_state = "HumanNeedsHelp";
738  humanidle_counter = 0;
739  } else if (observation == "16" || observation == "17" || observation == "18" || observation == "19" || observation == "27") {
740  robot_state = "WarningReceived";
741  } else if (observation == "64" || observation == "65" || observation == "66" || observation == "67") {
742  robot_state = "GlobalFail";
743  } else if (observation == "68" || observation == "69" || observation == "70" || observation == "71") {
744  robot_state = "GlobalFail";
745  } else if (observation == "80" || observation == "81" || observation == "82" || observation == "83") {
746  robot_state = "GlobalFail";
747  } else if (observation == "84" || observation == "85" || observation == "86" || observation == "87") {
748  robot_state = "GlobalFail";
749  } else if (observation == "96" || observation == "97" || observation == "98" || observation == "99") {
750  robot_state = "GlobalFail";
751  } else if (observation == "100" || observation == "101" || observation == "102" || observation == "103") {
752  robot_state = "GlobalFail";
753  }
754  }
755 
756  prev_robot_state = robot_state;
757  if (robot_state == "TaskHuman"){
758  robot_state = "0";
759  }
760  else if (robot_state == "GlobalSuccess"){
761  robot_state = "1";
762  }
763  else if (robot_state == "HumanNeedsHelp"){
764  robot_state = "2";
765  }
766  else if (robot_state == "WarningReceived"){
767  robot_state = "3";
768  }
769  else if (robot_state == "TaskRobot"){
770  robot_state = "4";
771  }
772  else if (robot_state == "GlobalFail"){
773  robot_state = "5";
774  }
775 
776  return robot_state;
777 }
